properties.areaDesc: Big Island Southeast Waters; Pailolo Channel; Big Island Leeward Waters; Maui County Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 3:35PM HST until February 11 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt and stronger gusts and seas 6
to 11 feet.

* WHERE...Maui County Leeward Waters, Pailolo Channel, Big
Island Leeward Waters and Big Island Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY
